Announcements [B]SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMENTS[/B] [CR] [CR][COLOR red] iLive has been acting strage lately, so It may work at times and not at others, Simply give it a few minutes and try again if you dont get a valid stream.[/COLOR] ActivateWindow(3003)
v180pop.jpg
Addon Settings [B]OPENS ADDON SETTINGS [/B][CR][CR]Change the settings of MDB ULTRA Addon.OpenSettings(plugin.video.moviedb) http://addonrepo.com/xbmchub/moviedb/resources/skins/DefaultSkin/media/addonsettings.png -
Version Information [B]MDB ULTRA VERSION INFORMATION[/B][CR][CR] Curent version information for MDB Ultra
- -
[COLOR red]V1.8.0[/COLOR][CR] Added Search to iLive Streams[CR][CR]
[COLOR red]V1.7.5[/COLOR][CR] Added automatically updating iLive Streams[CR][CR]
[COLOR red]V1.7.0a[/COLOR][CR] Cosmetic Enhancements[CR] Added Ability to turn off extras in Settings[CR][CR] [COLOR red]V1.7.0[/COLOR][CR] [COLOR gold]Added User Submitted Live Streams[/COLOR][CR] Added Supertoons Cartoons[CR][CR] [COLOR red]V1.6.0[/COLOR][CR] Added Cartoon Section[CR] Added Sport Section[CR] Added UFC to Sport Section[CR] Improved Announcments [CR] Added Special Menus Section[CR] Added Adult Section "Enable in Settings"[CR][CR]
[COLOR red]V1.5.0[/COLOR][CR] (1)Added Interactive Announcements[CR] Announcements will pop up during first launch[CR] After that, you may go to Addon Settings, and enter an interval at [CR] which the announcement pop up will display, or Disable them all together 'ITS YOUR CHOICE'[CR] If you wish to recieve Announcement PopUps at lauch every 5 days, Then enter 5 in the Interval Settings. IF you do not wish to recieve any popups, simply Disable them in the Settings. [CR] If Announcements are turned off in settings, you may still view them via the main menu.[CR]
(2) Added Ability to install any of my other addons and /or My repo from within the addon itself.[CR]
[COLOR red]V1.1.0[/COLOR][CR] Added DataCenter Movies and SeriesGate Tv Shows[CR]
[COLOR red]V1.0.0[/COLOR][CR] Initial Release"

Disclaimer [B]DISCLAIMER FROM THE AUTHOR[/B] [CR] A disclaimer from Blazetamer - - A Message / Disclaimer from the author:[CR] This addon, and any addon I create/produce, DOES NOT nor WILL EVER have[CR] Any type of Tracking Code.[CR] I take my users privacy VERY SERIOUSLY.[CR] If you feel that there is any tracking code whatsoever in ANY of my addons[CR] PLEASE feel free to reach out to me,on the community forum at[CR] www.XBMCHub.com[CR] Blazetamer
